description:
The last of the Six Funeral Wreaths is Bel`s twin brother, whom Bel supposedly killed. Bel suspects that Sil is an illusion, but he has to acknowledge that he is real when Sil shows him the birthmark that matches his own, as well as the scar that Bel gave him. Bel talks to the brother he was never supposed to meet again about the time Bel attacked him when he was little. Why is someone who is not supposed to exist alive? Irie at Melone Base says that it has something to do with Byakuran`s ability, but he keeps quiet about the details…
Source: crunchyroll
